title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\OSPolicy\Resource\PackageResource\Deb
name: Deb
description:
A deb package file. dpkg packages only support INSTALLED state.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.OSPolicy.Resource.PackageResource.Deb

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.pull_deps
params.description: Whether dependencies should also be installed. - install when false: dpkg -i package - install when true: apt-get update && apt-get -y install package.deb
